name: Pig Jumper
description:
Pig Jumper emerged from 1Hour Game Jam project. Help Piggy fly! Piggy needs to jump from platform to platfor. By pressing space longer or shorter, you can adjust the width of the jump.

This game was created within 1 hour + an additional half hour for porting it to android using the latest haxeflixel version. Tools used were Haxeflixel, Flashdevelop and Aseprite. You can find Pig Jumper also in the Play Store for Android.
